show.title: Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food

title: Ask Me Anything Recording - April 8th
subtitle: Ask Me Anything Recording - April 8th
summary:
The first Ask Me Anything webinar was an opportunity for the Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food community to come together and ask Koen van Seijen and everyone else on the call their burning questions regarding building a regenerative food system.

Find the topics discussed and the links on: www.investinginregenerativeagriculture.com/ama-webinar-4-8-2020/. 

----------------------------------------------------------

Welcome to Investing in Regenerative Agriculture and Food.
Join our Gumroad community, discover the tiers and benefits here: www.gumroad.com/investinginregenag.
